title: zip-spec-file
description:
ZIP A SPEC FILE AND ITS DATA FILES.

If zip-file already exists, it will be overwritten.  If -base-dir is not specified, the directory containing the spec file is used for the base directory.  The spec file must contain only relative paths, and no data files may be outside the base directory.  Scene files inside spec files are not checked for what files they reference, ensure that all data files referenced by the scene files are also referenced by the spec file.

spec-file.description: the specification file to add to zip file

extract-folder.description: the name of the folder created when the zip file is unzipped

zip-file.description: out - the zip file that will be created

directory.description:
specify a directory that all data files are somewhere within, this will become the root of the zipfile's directory structure

the directory

skip-missing.description: any missing files will generate only warnings, and the zip file will be created anyway
